name: Forgotten Sound 2: Destiny
description: Continuing his mystery-riddled journey, Shahbaz has to cross over lands that he could not have even imagined in his dreams to fix the mother’s instrument and save his father from the treacherous vizier; from the blazing Land of Lava to the cursed Land of Water, from the land whose colors have worn off to the land of molten marbles and the
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Xp/7/8.1/10 Processor: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible sound card Additional Notes: Mouse and keyboard
